mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE FROM POLL ORDER BY SDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POLL(POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE, EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_POLL.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{question}, #{sdate}, #{edate}, #{itemcount}, 0, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO POLLSUB(POLLSUBID, POLLID, ANSWER, ACOUNT) VALUES(SEQ_POLLSUB.NEXTVAL, (SELECT NVL(MAX(POLLID), 0) FROM POLL ), #{answer}, 0)
